Hi {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for choosing BlueWave Community Solar! Please see your attached signed community solar agreement outlining the terms and benefits of your subscription.
Our team is reviewing your application and will send a counter-signed agreement as soon as it is approved. If your application is not approved, we will send you an email letting you know why.
Stay tuned and thanks for choosing BlueWave Community Solar!
- From all of us here at BlueWave
